fields.name: WHO_LABEL
fields.description: Name of the virus variant assigned by the World Health Organization

fields.name: CONTRIBUTING_LINEAGES
fields.description: Pangolin lineages derived from the lineage

fields.name: COLOR
fields.description: Legacy variable. It is no longer relevant and will be removed perspectively.

fields.name: variant_category
fields.description: WHO Classification of the variant as VOC (variant of concern) or VOI (variant of interest)
